scenes.background: [Monica] and [Bob] are now discussing the task. [Bob] looks at you questioningly.
scenes.description: 'We really appreciate your help. But, are you sure you don't want to just enjoy your leave?' She raises an eyebrow.

options.text: I think it's best if I step back now and let you handle it.
options.analysis: You show good self-regulation and social skills by trusting your colleagues, but empathy is lower as you step back.

options.text: I understand, but I'll stick around a bit longer to make sure everything is on track.
options.analysis: You show high empathy and emotional perception by staying involved, but it may affect your self-regulation.

options.text: Let's go over the key points together and then I'll decide.
options.analysis: You balance your time off with work demands, showing good social skills, but emotional perception could be better.
